title: Nievenheim station
text:
Nievenheim station is a station in the district of Nievenheim in the town of <a href="Dormagen">Dormagen</a> in the German state of <a href="North%20Rhine-Westphalia">North Rhine-Westphalia</a>. It is on the <a href="Lower%20Left%20Rhine%20Railway">Lower Left Rhine Railway</a> and it is classified by <a href="Deutsche%20Bahn">Deutsche Bahn</a> as a <a href="German%20railway%20station%20categories">category 6 station</a>. The station was opened between 1880 and 1897.
The station is served by <a href="S11%20%28Rhine-Ruhr%20S-Bahn%29">line S 11</a> of the <a href="Rhine-Ruhr%20S-Bahn">Rhine-Ruhr S-Bahn</a>, running between <a href="D%C3%BCsseldorf%20Airport%20Terminal%20station">Düsseldorf Airport</a> and <a href="Bergisch%20Gladbach%20station">Bergisch Gladbach</a> every 20 minutes during the day.
It is also served by four bus routes operated by <a href="StadtBus%20Dormagen">StadtBus Dormagen</a>: 884 (at 60 minute intervals), 885 (60), 886 (30) and WE2 (60).
